```{r}
library(Ipaper)
library(tidymet)
library(ggplot2)

data <- fread("inst/anusplin_demo/RH_01-01.dat") %>%
  `colnames<-`(c("site", "lon", "lat", "alt", "RH"))
inds <- match2(st840$site, dat$site)$I_y
dat <- data[inds, ]

range <- c(69.625, 140.375, 14.625, 55.375)
params <- anusplin_params(dat, "RH", range, "inst/anusplin_demo/china_dem_025deg.txt")
anusplin_write("R/examples/anusplin_output", params, is.run = T)

```
